title: Difficult to charge customers for public goods

content.question: One major difference between public goods and private goods is that

choices.label: public goods exclude nonpaying consumers, while private goods are available to all
public goods are inferior goods, while private goods are normal goods
public goods generate negative externalities, while private goods generate positive externalities
it is difficult to charge customers directly for the provision of public goods
it is impossible for private firms to produce public goods

content.answer: it is difficult to charge customers directly for the provision of public goods
